title: The Proposal
description: I got in over my head.I bit off more than I could chew.And now my fate is sealed to the most ruthless man I know. Two hundred and fifty guests. They think they know what's happening today. But they don't have a clue.My wedding day. But it's so much more than that.NOTE: This is the first book in my Dark Wedding Duet. However, this is a FULL story with NO cliffhanger. The second book focuses on another couple. HEAs guaranteed in both books!
author: Kitty Thomas
